description: Master Java for backend: The enterprise standard. Object-Oriented, Spring Boot, and Modern Streams.

slides.title: Why Java?
slides.content:
# Enterprise King üëë

- **Strictly Typed:** Catches errors at compile time.
- **Scalable:** Runs on the JVM (Write Once, Run Anywhere).
- **Multithreaded:** Robust concurrency.

slides.title: OOP Core
slides.content:
# Object Oriented üì¶

Everything in Java is an Object.

- **Encapsulation:** Private fields.
- **Inheritance:** `extends`.
- **Polymorphism:** Overriding methods.

Core concept: `public static void main(String[] args)`.

slides.title: Spring Framework
slides.content:
# Spring Boot üå±

The de-facto standard for Java Web Apps.

It removes boilerplate configuration.

- **Dependency Injection:** `@Autowired`.
- **Web:** `@RestController`.
- **Data:** Spring Data JPA.

slides.title: Lambdas
Streams API
slides.content:
# Streams Process üåä

Fluent operations on collections (Map, Filter, Reduce).

```java
List<String> names = users.stream()
    .filter(u -> u.getAge() > 18)
    .map(User::getName)
    .collect(Collectors.toList());
```

slides.title: Maven & Gradle
slides.content:
# Build Tools üõ†Ô∏è

Manage dependencies and build artifacts (`.jar` files).

- **Maven:** Uses `pom.xml` (XML based).
- **Gradle:** Uses `build.gradle` (Groovy/Kotlin DSL, faster).

slides.title: JPA & Hibernate
slides.content:
# Database Access üóÑÔ∏è

- **JDBC:** Low-level SQL access.
- **Hibernate:** Typesafe ORM (Object Relational Mapper).
- **JPA:** The standard specification (Hibernate implements JPA).

Map classes to tables: `@Entity`, `@Table`.

slides.title: Concurrency
slides.content:
# Threads üßµ

Java has built-in threading.

Modern approach: `CompletableFuture`, `ExecutorService`.

Virtual Threads (Project Loom) coming in newer versions for massive concurrency.
